snippet: The Miami Heat’s big three, including Dwayne Wade, expressed reservations about playing in New York so soon after Hurricane Sandy, but they said they hoped Friday’s game would provide a welcomed diversion.
abstract: The Miami Heat’s big three, including Dwayne Wade, expressed reservations about playing in New York so soon after Hurricane Sandy, but they said they hoped Friday’s game would provide a welcomed diversion.

headline.main: Wade Opposes Knicks Game but Sees Benefits
headline.print_headline: Fans Find Relief in Game Despite Some Misgivings
